name: A. Fraction
statement:
Petya is a big fan of mathematics, especially its part related to
fractions. Recently he learned that a fraction is called iff its
numerator is smaller than its denominator () and that the fraction is
called if its numerator and its denominator are coprime (they do not
have positive common divisors except ).During his free time, Petya
thinks about proper irreducible fractions and converts them to decimals
using the calculator. One day he mistakenly pressed addition button ()
instead of division button () and got sum of numerator and denominator
that was equal to instead of the expected decimal notation. Petya wanted
to restore the original fraction, but soon he realized that it might not
be done uniquely. That’s why he decided to determine maximum possible
proper irreducible fraction such that sum of its numerator and
denominator equals . Help Petya deal with this problem.
